Department_No.query: select Distinct DepartmentCode,DepartmentName ,(CASE WHEN DepartmentName = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) from DimDepartment with (NoLock) Order by (CASE WHEN DepartmentName = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), DepartmentName
Department_No.label: DepartmentName

Markdown_Cycle.query: SELECT DISTINCT [Markdown_Cycle] = COALESCE(CASE [Cycle] WHEN 1 THEN 'Cycle One' WHEN 2 THEN 'Cycle Two' ELSE CONVERT(CHAR(9),[Cycle]) END, 'Unknown') FROM [STP_CMS_DW].[dbo].[DeptCycles] DC WITH (NOLOCK) UNION SELECT 'Unknown'
Markdown_Cycle.label: Markdown_Cycle

Markdown_Flag.query: SELECT DISTINCT MarkdownFlag FROM (Values ('Full Price'),('Markdown')) M (MarkdownFlag )
Markdown_Flag.label: MarkdownFlag

Department_No.query: select Distinct DepartmentCode,DepartmentName ,(CASE WHEN DepartmentName = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) from DimDepartment with (NoLock) Order by (CASE WHEN DepartmentName = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), DepartmentName
Department_No.label: DepartmentName

Transaction_Type.query: SELECT [TransactionTypeName] FROM [dbo].[DimSalesInventoryTransactionTypeReference] WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE ([TransactionTypeName] LIKE '%Sale%' OR [TransactionTypeName] LIKE '%Return%')
Transaction_Type.label: TransactionTypeName

Sort_By.label: TW Sales Units,TW Sales Dollars,TW Inventory Amt,SS Ratio Weeks

PO_Status.query: SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN H.OrderStatusCode = '' THEN 'No Status' ELSE H.OrderStatusCode END AS PO_Status FROM [DimPurchaseOrder] H WITH(NOLOCK) ORDER BY 1
PO_Status.label: PO_Status

PO_Status.query: SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN H.OrderStatusCode = '' THEN 'No Status' ELSE H.OrderStatusCode END AS PO_Status FROM [DimPurchaseOrder] H WITH(NOLOCK) ORDER BY 1
PO_Status.label: PO_Status

PO_Status.query: SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN H.OrderStatusCode = '' THEN 'No Status' ELSE H.OrderStatusCode END AS PO_Status FROM [DimPurchaseOrder] H WITH(NOLOCK) ORDER BY 1
PO_Status.label: PO_Status
